title: A Brand New Upscale High-Rise in Downtown Dallas**ONE MONTH FREE!**
posting_body: Downtown Dallas's Upscale High-Rise Apartment with Panoramic Views and Klyde Warren Park Outside Your New Apartment.
Dining, Shopping, and Entertainment at Your Door Step!
Amenities Include a State of the Art Fitness Center, Yoga Studio, Infinity Edge Resort Style Pool with Cabanas, Concierge Service, Plus So Much More.
Enjoy the Luxury of Quartz Countertops, Wine Refrigerator, and Stainless Steel Appliances in the Kitchen.
Walk-In Closets, Floor to Ceiling Windows, Garden Tubs, Stand-Up Showers, Wood Floors, with Washer and Dryer Included in Your Upscale Apartment Home.
Parking Garage and Elevators as Well.
For More Information Please Call Jacquelyn with Dash Realty at
**12 Month Lease or Longer, No Corporate Leases, and No Sublease**
